invoice_only_shipped_items.label: Invoice only shipped items
invoice_only_shipped_items.comment: Create invoice only for shipped items (partial invoice)

print_invoice_twice_if_taxless.label: Print invoices twice if no tax

print_invoice_twice_if_payment_method.label: Print invoice twice if payment method is

print_shipments.label: Insert packing slips on download documents

print_preparation.label: Insert packing document on download documents

print_comments.label: Insert orders comments summary on download documents

print_organiser_comments.label: Display comments from organizers in summary on download documents

print_order_public_comments.label: Display public comments from order in summary on download documents

print_order_private_comments.label: Display private comments from order in summary on download documents

create_organizer_on_commit.label: Log into organizers who packed the order

prevent_packing_if_order_already_shipped.label: Prevent packing if order already shipped

print_packing_slip_when_order_packed.label: Print packing slip when order is packed

print_invoice_when_order_packed.label: Print invoice when order is packed

print_shipping_label.label: Print shipping label when order is packed

display_quantity_button.label: Display quantity buttons
display_quantity_button.comment: If enabled, you'll be able to set a product as scanned without using a barcode reader but simply clicking on + / - buttons

display_serials.label: Display serials number
display_serials.comment: If enabled, you'll be able to fill serials numbers for each product

display_barcode.label: Display barcode
display_barcode.comment: If enabled, add a column to display product barcode

scan_serials.label: Scan serial number after product barcode

automatically_add_order_in_selected_orde.label: Automatically add order in selected orders

image_thumbnail_size.label: Image thumbnail size
image_thumbnail_size.comment: In pixels, applies to both width and height

single_user_mode.label: Single user order preparation mode
single_user_mode.comment: if you enable this option, the order preparation screen will work in single user mode

pdf_use_truetype_font.label: PDF use truetype font
pdf_use_truetype_font.comment: Use this option if you encounter accent issues or if international characters does not display

display_quantity_change_dropdown.label: Display drop down to change quantity in selected orders tab

enable_ignored_orders_selection.label: Enable to select ignored orders for preparation

lines.label: Lines
lines.comment: You can use any shipping address field with {} (check debug mode option below)

debug_mode.label: Debug mode
debug_mode.comment: Use this option to display every available codes when printing the label
